charges.charge_description: 18:793(e) Attempted communication of info relating to national defense (4-5)

charges.charge_disposition: Pay fine of $50,000. Consisting of $25,000 on ct 4 and $25,000 on ct 5. Cust BOP for 24 mos. Supv rel for 3 yrs, comply w/rules and regs of P/O and G.O. 318, participate in psychological/psychiatric cnsling. Pay S/A of $100. Dft o rd to sur to BOP on or bef 5/13/96 at noon. On govt's mot, Crt ord remaining cts dism. Bnd exon upon surr.
On govt's mot, crt hereby ord remaining cts dism.
